bibl.author: Walt Whitman
bibl.title: Walt Whitman to Daniel G. Gillette, 26 September [1873]
bibl.orgName: The location of the original manuscript is unknown.

revisionDesc.change: extracted transcription from Major Authors cd

body.p: I am delighted to please you in so trifling a matter as signing the pictures for your—and my—English friends—(substituting portraits I like better, instead of those you sent, which I don't like—though they are fine bits of work.) . . .
